abstract: Henry R. Kravis, titan of the private equity industry and founder of powerhouse Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, would rather be in someone else’s shoes right now: Warren E. Buffet’s.
snippet: Henry R. Kravis, titan of the private equity industry and founder of powerhouse Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, would rather be in someone else’s shoes right now: Warren E. Buffet’s.
lead_paragraph: Henry R. Kravis, titan of the private equity industry and founder of powerhouse Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, would rather be in someone else’s shoes now. Warren E. Buffet’s, to be exact.

headline.main: Kravis Wants to Rock It Like Buffett
